org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.api.network

Interface INetwork

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFullNetworkListener, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.nbt.INBTSerializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Network

    public interface INetwork
extends IFullNetworkListener, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.nbt.INBTSerializable
    A network can hold a set of INetworkElements. Note that this network only contains references to the relevant data, it does not contain the actual information.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.nbt.INBTSerializable

        org.cyclops.cyclopscore.persist.nbt.INBTSerializable.SelfNBTClassType
